findings.title: Vulnerability: Function should emit an event
findings.description: Function which change important attributes, like reserve percents, reserve fund, dev percent, dev fund, PoolLockedTimeAndFee should emit events for more clearness and trackability

findings.title: Public function that could be declared external
findings.description: public functions that are never called by the contract should be declared as external

findings.title: Excessive Line Length
findings.description: Lines 95, 97, 122, 124, 133, 144, 183, 214, 270, 285, 296, 313, 345, 398, 490, 493, 517 and 551 of the HopeChef.sol are above the recommended maximum line length
